org.firstinspires.ftc.ftccommon.external

Annotation Type OnCreateEventLoop


  • @Documented
 @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface OnCreateEventLoop
    OnCreateEventLoop provides an easy way to access to the robot controller event loop.

    Place an OnCreateEventLoop annotation on a public static method in your code, and that method will be automatically called from FtcRobotControllerActivity, after the event loop has been created. The method must take a Context and an FtcEventLoop as its parameters.
